title: South Africa's Zuma 'innocent until proven otherwise'
text:
South Africa's Zuma 'innocent until proven otherwise' 11:17am BST - 01:53 
Former South African president Jacob Zuma appeared in court on Friday to face corruption charges relating to a $2.5 billion arms deal, later telling a crowd he would be proven innocent in the long running case that resurfaced after his fall from power. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
